#include<stdio.h>

int gcd(int a,int b)
{
    if(a%b==0)
        return b;
    else
        return(gcd(b,a%b));
}
int main()
{
    int t=0;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
     int n=0,i=1,counter=0;
     scanf("%d",&n);
     for(i=1;i<n;i++)
        if(gcd(n,i)==1)
        counter++;
     printf("%d\n",counter);

    }

    return 0;
}
